thread.title: Morning links: President Thomas S. Monson is a Michigan fan; reaction to 'The Drive'; SUU's stadium featured
thread.title_full: Morning links: President Thomas S. Monson is a Michigan fan; reaction to 'The Drive'; SUU's stadium featured | Deseret News

author: Ryan McDonald
title: Morning links: President Thomas S. Monson is a Michigan fan; reaction to 'The Drive'; SUU's stadium featured
text:
The president of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints is a faithful Wolverines follower; Pac-12 show featuring Utah gets praise; Thunderbirds' football stadium ranked one of the best.
Upcoming Games BYU Football BYU football stats & schedule Cincinnati @ BYU Lavell Edwards Stadium, Provo Oct. 16, 6:00 p.m. 2 Days 19 Hrs 41 Mins 40 Secs Utah Football Utah football stats & schedule ASU @ Utah Rice-Eccles Stadium, Salt Lake City Oct. 17, 8:00 p.m. 3 Days 21 Hrs 41 Mins 28 Secs More Coverage Forecasting the Utah Jazz‚Äôs 2015-16 record using win shares Thomas S. Monson, president of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints, could have a conflict of interest this Saturday when the BYU Cougars face the Michigan Wolverines on the football field.
A tweet from broadcaster Robbie Bullough on Wednesday pointed out that Monson's biography "To the Rescue" details his love of the maize and blue.
"It is a rite of passage to be invited to join Grandpa in the basement on game day," reads the book authored by Heidi S. Swinton. "He presents each grandchild a Michigan cap in a special ceremony with the Michigan fight song playing in the background. If the team falters in the first half, he switches the maize and blue hats to blue and maize ones to spur the team on."
Divided loyalties? @ThomasSMonson is chairman of @BYU board of trustees, but also an avid @umichfootball fan. pic.twitter.com/xa6KnBbOlh
‚Äî Robbie Bullough (@RobbieBullough) September 23, 2015
Fans react to Utes ' first appearance on 'The Drive'
University of Utah football team would be featured on the Pac-12 Networks' special show "The Drive," fans have been looking forward to getting a detailed look at Kyle Whittingham's club.
They finally got their chance Wednesday night as the first episode aired, and Twitter reviews were very positive.
watching #TheDrive on the Pac-12 Network makes me love Utah football so much moreüòçüôåüèΩ @Pac12Networks @Utah_Football @UtahCoachWhitt

Visiting SUU football stadium on FCS bucket list
list of eight FCS stadiums to visit before one dies, Caffaro puts SUU's Eccles Coliseum fifth.
"Renovated in 1997, Eccles Coliseum features sensationally scenic red mountains to the east and west to provide a breathtaking view during Southern Utah home games," Caffaro writes.
Ryan McDonald is a sports reporter at DeseretNews.com . Follow him on Twitter @ryanwmcdonald.
